title: Charlotte's Web Announces Management Appointments in Finance and Operations - Yahoo Finance
content: Charlotte's Web Announces Management Appointments in Finance and Operations  Yahoo Finance
description: (TSX: CWEB) (OTCQX: CWBHF) Charlotte's Web Holdings, Inc., ("Charlotte's Web" or the "Company"), the market leader in full-spectrum cannabidiol ("CBD") hemp extract wellness products, today announced management changes in finance and operations.
